name: Solfège Runner
description:
Description

Solfège Runner is a serious game with runner levels where the platforms are musical notes from sheet music. Thanks to the achievements and the best scores, the player will be able to learn music theory and validate his learning.

Since this game is a runner, the two main mechanics are a Jump and a Downward's Dash. Sliding on the platform while holding the Dash's button gives the player a score multiplier. So the more you slide, the more you score!
